titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before Her Majesty the Queen Dowager in her chappel at Sommerset House, upon the second Sunday after Easter, April 10, 1687 / by F. James Ayray ... chaplain and preacher in ordinary to His Excellency the Spanish Ambassador.
titleStmt.author: Ayray, James.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John and Thomas Lane ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
